features: 160-piece Johnson & Johnson All-Purpose Portable Emergency First Aid Kit is ideal for home, in cars, outdoors, dorm rooms, & while camping, cooking or on-the-go to help care for minor cuts, scrapes, burns, itches, pain, skin rashes & insect bites

All-purpose, compact first aid kit includes essential first aid supplies like cleansing wipes, gauze pads, assorted bandages, rolled gauze, antibiotic cream, itch stopping cream, acetaminophen caplets, an instant cold pack, and much more

Includes a variety of Band-Aid Brand Adhesive Bandages in assorted sizes for minor wound care, as well as Band-Aid Brand First Aid Products such as gauze, non-stick pads & tape for larger minor wounds, all organized in a durable & accessible box

Includes full size 0.5 oz Neosporin + Pain Relief topical cream to help prevent infection while relieving pain & full size 1.0 oz Extra Strength Benadryl Itch-Stopping topical cream to help soothe itching from rashes or insect bites

Travel first aid kit also contains Tylenol Extra Strength acetaminophen pain reliever caplets & a Bengay Non-Medicated Instant Cold Pack to help ease minor aches & pains, as well as two pairs of gloves & a helpful first aid guide
body.description: Care for minor cuts, scrapes and burns with the Johnson & Johnson All Purpose Compact First Aid Kit. This emergency first aid kit contains essential first aid supplies including cleansing wipes, gauze pads, assorted bandages, rolled gauze, antibiotic cream, itch stopping cream, acetaminophen caplets, an instant ice pack, and more. This portable first aid kit contains products from leading, doctor-recommended brands, including Band-Aid Brand Adhesive Bandages, Neosporin, Tylenol, Bengay and Benadryl. It also includes a first aid guide and a durable, plastic box to keep items accessible and organized. This #1 selling branded first aid kit is for use anywhere - perfect for use at home, in a dorm, in the car and on-the-go, or for camping and other outdoor activities. First aid kit offers a great value by saving you over $8 vs. average retail price for the included first aid supplies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great first aid kit for your car or travels
reviews.reviewText: I needed an upgrade on my first aid kit and found this one on line. Full of great items and you can purchase with your HSA account. Compact and great price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice functional kit
reviews.reviewText: I bought this kit to keep in my car for emergency’s. It’s perfect size and very light! I plan to purchase another one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly recommended for its convenience and reliability!
reviews.reviewText: The Johnson & Johnson All-Purpose Portable Compact First Aid Kit is a lifesaver for on-the-go situations, especially during sporting events. Its compact design is perfect for keeping in the car, and it has proven to be very useful on multiple occasions. The variety of supplies inside cover a range of minor injuries, providing quick and effective solutions when needed. A must-have for anyone who wants peace of mind during outdoor activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Reliable and Compact
reviews.reviewText: The Johnson & Johnson All-Purpose Portable Compact First Aid Kit is a reliable and convenient solution for basic first aid needs. It contains a variety of essential items in a compact and easily portable case. The kit includes adhesive bandages, gauze pads, cleansing wipes, and more, providing the necessary tools to handle minor injuries and emergencies.One aspect I appreciate about this first aid kit is its compact size, making it easy to carry in a backpack, glove compartment, or travel bag. The contents are well-organized, ensuring quick access to the required supplies. The items included are of good quality and are suitable for everyday mishaps.However, I do have one minor suggestion for improvement. The case is made of plastic, and I personally would have preferred a different material, such as fabric, that feels sturdier and more durable. While the plastic case does offer some water resistance and protection, a different material could potentially enhance its overall durability and withstand rough handling or accidental drops.Overall, the Johnson & Johnson All-Purpose Portable Compact First Aid Kit remains a reliable and handy solution for basic first aid needs. Its compact size, well-organized contents, and quality supplies make it a valuable addition to any emergency preparedness kit or for everyday use. With just a minor improvement to the case material, it would be an even more ideal choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a basic first aid kit, but does the job to be in the car. I had purchased another one years ago off Amazon. That was just pure junk. All the Band-Aids were labeled with K-pop singers an anime. Everything in this first aid kit is high-quality brand name and the best part is it’s refillable and reusable. Definitely great to have in the vehicle and have had to use it a couple times already would recommend it for anybody. It’s very compact and simple the store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For the college dorm
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased as part of the packing-for-college collection and it is perfect. It is small enough to store in a drawer or bathroom cabinet and contains all the basic essentials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for the price
reviews.reviewText: Great value for the price. Comes with 3 different sizes of bandages. The box has plenty of items to handle everyday minor injuries. I am very pleased with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Help When You Need It
reviews.reviewText: I bought this before we headed on a long road trip “just in case” . Who knew how important that purchase was until my hand was bleeding! Easy care, clean up cut, bandaged in a moment. Can’t say enough about how well organized and thoughtful this kit is. We just need travel sized liquid benedryl or Zyrtec and we’re set!
